name: Ragdoll Basketball
description:
V1.0.5 Coming 1st of January Adding a new playable character The Butler 

Dunk your ragdoll in the net! Complete insane challenges and unlock new playable characters each with their own unique abilities.

Current Playable characters
* Gym man
* Santa 
* Zombie Girl
* Space Explorer
* Classic ragdoll

Joining the crew in early 2021 is Bombi as a playable character from his very own mobile game Bombi the great freeze
